extendedInfo.description: Swiftly browse hundreds of daily deals from thousands of reputable retailers.  Save money at your favorite stores with coupon codes.  Save deals for later use, or share them with your social network.dealnews App key features:- Powerful Search: find deals and coupons by keyword, category, store, or any combination.- Save for later: Can't buy it right now? Save the deal for future consideration.- Share: share relevant deals with family, friends and coworkers via Facebook, Twitter or email.- Coupon Code Tracking: search for coupons by store; includes easy âclippingâ for use at the storeâs online checkout.- Newest Deals: like to check dealnews several times a day? The "New" tab will show you all the deals that are new since your last visit.And Coming Soon:- Push Alerts: create personal deal alerts and be notified within two minutes of a matching deal being posted.- Account Sync: connect your phone to your "mydealnews" account, enabling backup of your alert settings and other advanced features.

reviews.title: Perfect app
reviews.comment: Please fix app for 5 stars
reviews.author: Nathan Kirsch

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Works great with ATRIX 4G.  Simple app that does not try to be everything the full website is. Easy to navigate and fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!  Deals for everyone!
reviews.comment: I look at this app daily, some days multiple times... it has the potential to save you a ton of money on things we use everyday.......
reviews.author: Jason Holt

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Love this app.  Been a loyal fan good over 2 years now.   Good stuff :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great site, great app!
reviews.comment: Takes one of the best deal sites on the Web and makes it easy to use on a mobile device.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great deals.
reviews.comment: I enjoy how they categorize all deals. Some deals last only hours but checking this app regularly ensures a great bargain. Have fun saving.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & Easy
reviews.comment: Nice, clean, simple app. Easy to use & frequently updated w/ new deals.
reviews.author: L.T. Breedlove

reviews.title: Great app for saving money
reviews.comment: I love this app. I take a peak almost daily and always find GREAT deals. Especially around the holidays. Keep the deals coming!
reviews.author: Kimberly Washburn

reviews.title: Very Useful App
reviews.comment: I give this app 5 stars because it has a lot of great deals. It is great if you do a good deal of online purchasing.
reviews.author: Donald Bennett

reviews.title: Good for the basics.
reviews.comment: Better use of the tabs is necessary, difficult to scroll across. Searching for deals and setting up alerts could be more streamlined.
reviews.author: Chandresh Ladva

reviews.title: Awesome app.
reviews.comment: If you are a deal hunter, this app is great at locating deals from many sites and presenting them into one easy to navigate app. It\'s saved me tons of money..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well organized... Useful
reviews.comment: Thanks for scouring the web for great deals...a huge time saver
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: Very useful app and offers the features of the website.been a dealnews fan for a while and this is completely the icing on the cake :) love that it allows you to save deals your interested in so you can come back and check it out when you have more time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: No-nonsense interface is perfect. I prefer this app over the desktop site. Perfect app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: Now they\'re adding local deals to the main list. 99%don\'t even apply because they\'re all over the US. Now a big waste of time having to go through all of them. I don\'t have a lot of time to go through them all. Will go back to Slickdeals.
reviews.author: Enrique Suarez

reviews.title: Great app... Use it every day
reviews.comment: Must have for fellow bargain hunters.  I don\'t buy anything without checking dealnews first.  The app makes it even easier than bookmarking the Site
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: They started adding local deals that spam the page... Why not just make one link with sub links to these deals? Edit: they removed them, thank god.
reviews.author: Tom Yang

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Find some great deals on here! Easy to use and highly recommended!
reviews.author: Alex Golimbievsky

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Quick access to the best deals on the web. Easy organized and absolutely love the morning jolt!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s very nice.
reviews.comment: Much easier to browse. I took one star off because sometimes when I open up a deal I try to scroll down to read everything and it takes me to the next one.
reviews.author: Zii Miller
